title: May back in Brussels for EU talks
feed: Theresa May is back in Brussels seeking changes to the Brexit withdrawal agreement

title: Hospitals 'overcrowded' ahead of Christmas
feed: Hospitals in England are overcrowded and eight accident and emergency units have had to turn away patients arriving in ambulances, the latest figures show

title: Climate change: Failure to tackle warming 'suicidal'
feed: The UN secretary-general has warned negotiators at a major meeting that failing to increase efforts on climate change would be not only immoral but suicidal, for the planet

title: Brexit: Your simple guide to the UK leaving the EU
feed: Feeling a little lost on Brexit? Never really got your head around it in the first place? Let us walk you through it.

title: What does Ireland do if thereâ€™s no deal?
feed: The Irish government has been consistent that whatever happens in the Brexit process there will be no hardening of the Irish border.
